BBDB1.A.DE.N.A.C.IFRS.B.A.K.E.E039.V50.A: Operating income before depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA) as a percentage of revenues / Median / Non-financial listed groups / Germany / Total / Profitability

General: Non-financial groups listed in Germany, which publish IFRS consolidated financial statements on a quarterly basis and make a noteworthy contribution to value added in Germany. Quantile data are based on unweighted return on sales of the groups.
